alert.note: Alert for North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:39AM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. In the North Snowy Range Foothills, total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches along Interstate 80 near Elk Mountain and Arlington. Lower totals are expected further north towards Medicine Bow and Rock River. In the North Laramie Range, total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, mainly in Converse county. Lower totals are expected further south in Albany county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including the Arlington and Elk Mountain along Interstate 80 and the North Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to areas of snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills
